TopicTitle: Bug in editor found organge tanks and decouplers

Articles.Content:
So I was building a new munship when I noticed a slight but in 1.0.2... I can push tanks way far out. That is not the maxiumum extent, it goes way further. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
